cleaned_text: Basic knowledge of Naturopathy and AyurvedaBasic knowledge of Naturopathy and Ayurveda(NDDY 1st,1st) -------------------------------- Natural healing system turns us back into the cycle of nature, making life loving, blissful external growth and inward growth. A person who has learned to live with natural medicine rises above the Annamaya Kosh and travels to the pranamaya, manomaya and vigyanamaya kosha and gets established in the Anandamaya Kosh. Students and every readers are requested to not only read natural medicine but also to adopt it so that their life can be happy.
